channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Artificial sweeteners could soon taste just like sugar
item.description: Scientists have identified compounds that block bitter taste receptors activated by saccharin and acesulfame K. The most promising is (R)-(-)-carvone,...

item.title: Scientists turn spin loss into energy, unlocking ultra-low-power AI chips

item.title: Scientists crack a 60-year-old quantum mystery
item.description: Physicists have built a novel superconducting platform that mimics hidden vortex states once thought unobservable. Their "backdoor" method overcomes e...

item.title: A hidden sugar source in ketchup, salad dressing, and toothpaste
item.description: UBC researchers revealed that gut bacteria can digest cellulose-based food thickeners, once thought indigestible, by using enzymes activated by natura...

item.title: Eating meat may protect against cancer, landmark research shows
item.description: A large study of nearly 16,000 adults found no link between eating animal protein and higher death risk. Surprisingly, higher animal protein intake wa...
